00023 TestCondDataProcessor::TestCondDataProcessor()
00024   : marlin::Processor("TestCondDataProcessor"),
00025     _dbCondDataChange(this, &TestCondDataProcessor::dbCondDataChanged ),
00026     _conversionCondDataChange(this, &TestCondDataProcessor::conversionCondDataChanged )
00027 {
00028   _colNameFromDB=COL_TRIGGER_ASSIGNMENT;
00029   _colNameFromDB+="_conddb";
00030   registerProcessorParameter( "CondDataColNameFromDB" , 
00031                               "The conditions data collection coming from the database or flat file (ideally, the trigger configuration data)." ,
00032                               _colNameFromDB ,
00033                               _colNameFromDB );
00034 
00035   _colNameFromConversion=COL_TRIGGER_ASSIGNMENT;
00036   registerProcessorParameter( "CondDataColNameFromConversion" , 
00037                               "The name of the conditions data produced by the converter (ideally, the trigger configuration data" ,
00038                               _colNameFromConversion ,
00039                               _colNameFromConversion );
00040 }
00041 
00042 void TestCondDataProcessor::init() 
00043 {
00044   printParameters();
00045 
00046   marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_dbCondDataChange,
00047                                                         _colNameFromDB );
00048 
00049   marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_conversionCondDataChange ,
00050                                                         _colNameFromConversion );
00051 
00052   _dbCondDataHandler = lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler( _colNameFromDB );
00053   _conversionCondDataHandler = lccd::LCConditionsMgr::instance()->getHandler( _colNameFromConversion );
00054 
00055   _dbSerialID=0;
00056   _dbThisId=0;
00057   _dbSince=lccd::LCCDMinusInf;
00058   _dbTill=lccd::LCCDMinusInf;
00059   _conversionThisId=0;
00060   _conversionSerialID=0;
00061   _realConversionSerialID=0;
00062 
00063   _conversionSince=lccd::LCCDMinusInf;
00064   _conversionTill=lccd::LCCDMinusInf;
00065   _nComparisons=0;
00066 
00067   _lastEventNumber=UINT_MAX;
00068   _eventOfLastConversionChange=UINT_MAX-1;
00069   _conversionCondDataCol=0;
00070   _dbCondDataCol=0;
00071 }
00072 
00073 void TestCondDataProcessor::dbCondDataChanged(EVENT::LCCollection *col)
00074 {
00075   _dbCondDataCol=col;
00076   _dbSerialID++;
00077 
00078   _dbOlderId = _dbOldId;
00079   _dbOldId = _dbThisId;
00080   _dbThisId = _dbSerialID;
00081   _dbOlderSince=_dbOldSince;
00082   _dbOlderTill=_dbOldTill;
00083   _dbOldSince=_dbSince;
00084   _dbOldTill=_dbTill;
00085   _dbSince=_dbCondDataHandler->validSince();
00086   _dbTill=_dbCondDataHandler->validTill();
00087 
00088   compareCondData();
00089   _dbCondDataColStat.add(col->getNumberOfElements());
00090 
00091   EVENT::StringVec keys;
00092   UInt_t keys_total=0;
00093 
00094   col->getParameters().getIntKeys(keys);
00095   keys_total +=  keys.size();
00096 
00097   col->getParameters().getFloatKeys(keys);
00098   keys_total +=  keys.size();
00099 
00100   col->getParameters().getStringKeys(keys);
00101   keys_total +=  keys.size();
00102 
00103   _dbCondDataParStat.add( keys_total );
00104 
00105 }
00106 
00107 void TestCondDataProcessor::conversionCondDataChanged(EVENT::LCCollection *col)
00108 {
00109   _conversionCondDataCol=col;
00110   _realConversionSerialID++;
00111 
00112   bool skipped=true;
00113   if ( _eventOfLastConversionChange != _lastEventNumber ) {
00114     skipped=false;
00115     _conversionSerialID++;
00116   }
00117   _eventOfLastConversionChange = _lastEventNumber;
00118 
00119   _conversionOlderId = _conversionOldId;
00120   _conversionOldId = _conversionThisId;
00121   _conversionThisId = _conversionSerialID;
00122   _conversionOlderSince=_conversionOldSince;
00123   _conversionOlderTill=_conversionOldTill;
00124   _conversionOldSince=_conversionSince;
00125   _conversionOldTill=_conversionTill;
00126 
00127   _conversionSince=_conversionCondDataHandler->validSince();
00128   _conversionTill=_conversionCondDataHandler->validTill();
00129 
00130   if (!skipped) {
00131     compareCondData();
00132   }
00133   _conversionCondDataColStat.add(col->getNumberOfElements());
00134 
00135   EVENT::StringVec keys;
00136   UInt_t keys_total=0;
00137 
00138   col->getParameters().getIntKeys(keys);
00139   keys_total +=  keys.size();
00140 
00141   col->getParameters().getFloatKeys(keys);
00142   keys_total +=  keys.size();
00143 
00144   col->getParameters().getStringKeys(keys);
00145   keys_total +=  keys.size();
00146 
00147   _conversionCondDataParStat.add( keys_total );
00148   
00149 }
00150 
00151 void TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData()
00152 {
00153   if (_conversionSerialID == _dbSerialID) {
00154     _nComparisons++;
00155     if (!_conversionCondDataCol || !_dbCondDataCol) {
00156       std::stringstream message;
00157       message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> ";
00158       if (_conversionCondDataCol) {
00159         message << "No collection from the converter.";
00160       }
00161       if (_dbCondDataCol) {
00162         message << "No collection from the database.";
00163       }
00164       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00165     }
00166 
00167     if (_conversionCondDataCol->getNumberOfElements() != _dbCondDataCol->getNumberOfElements()) {
00168       std::stringstream message;
00169       message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00170               << "Collections contain different number of elements: "
00171               << _colNameFromConversion << " != " << _colNameFromDB << " -> " 
00172               << _conversionCondDataCol->getNumberOfElements() << " !=  " << _dbCondDataCol->getNumberOfElements();
00173       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00174     }
00175 
00176     for (unsigned int  element_i=0; element_i< static_cast<unsigned int>(_conversionCondDataCol->getNumberOfElements()); element_i++) {
00177 
00178       LCGenericObject *_genericObjDb=dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject *>(_dbCondDataCol->getElementAt(element_i));
00179       LCGenericObject *_genericObjConversion=dynamic_cast<LCGenericObject *>(_conversionCondDataCol->getElementAt(element_i));
00180 
00181       if (_genericObjConversion->getNInt() != _genericObjDb->getNInt() ) {
00182         std::stringstream message;
00183         message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00184                 << "Number of integer differs for element " << element_i << ":"
00185                 << _colNameFromConversion << " != " << _colNameFromDB << " -> " 
00186                 << _genericObjConversion->getNInt() << " != "  << _genericObjDb->getNInt();
00187 
00188         throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00189       }
00190 
00191       for (unsigned int val_i=0; val_i < static_cast<unsigned int>(_genericObjConversion->getNInt()); val_i++) {
00192         if (_genericObjConversion->getIntVal(val_i) != _genericObjDb->getIntVal(val_i)) {
00193           std::stringstream message;
00194           message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00195                   << "Integers " << val_i << " of collection element " << element_i << " do not match :"
00196                   << _genericObjConversion->getIntVal(val_i) << " != "  << _genericObjDb->getIntVal(val_i);
00197           throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00198         }
00199       }
00200 
00201       for (unsigned int val_i=0; val_i < static_cast<unsigned int>(_genericObjConversion->getNFloat()); val_i++) {
00202         if (_genericObjConversion->getFloatVal(val_i) != _genericObjDb->getFloatVal(val_i)) {
00203           std::stringstream message;
00204           message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00205                   << "Float values " << val_i << " of collection element " << element_i << " do not match :"
00206                   << _genericObjConversion->getFloatVal(val_i) << " != "  << _genericObjDb->getFloatVal(val_i);
00207           throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00208         }
00209       }
00210 
00211       for (unsigned int val_i=0; val_i < static_cast<unsigned int>(_genericObjConversion->getNDouble()); val_i++) {
00212         if (_genericObjConversion->getDoubleVal(val_i) != _genericObjDb->getDoubleVal(val_i)) {
00213           std::stringstream message;
00214           message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00215                   << "Double values " << val_i << " of collection element " << element_i << " do not match :"
00216                   << _genericObjConversion->getDoubleVal(val_i) << " != "  << _genericObjDb->getDoubleVal(val_i);
00217           throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00218         }
00219       }
00220     }
00221 
00222     // compare parameters
00223     EVENT::StringVec conversion_keys;
00224     EVENT::StringVec db_keys;
00225     _conversionCondDataCol->getParameters().getIntKeys(conversion_keys);
00226     _dbCondDataCol->getParameters().getIntKeys(db_keys);
00227     
00228     EVENT::StringVec::iterator a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBLayer"));
00229     db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00230 
00231     if ( conversion_keys.size() != db_keys.size() ) {
00232       std::cout << "conversion keys:" << std::endl;
00233       for_each ( conversion_keys.begin(), conversion_keys.end(), print );
00234 
00235       std::cout << "db keys:" << std::endl;
00236       for_each ( db_keys.begin(), db_keys.end(), print );
00237       std::cout << std::endl;
00238 
00239       std::stringstream message;
00240       message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00241               << "Number of int keys does not match "
00242               << _colNameFromConversion << " != " << _colNameFromDB << " -> " 
00243               << conversion_keys.size() << " !=  " << db_keys.size();
00244       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00245     }
00246 
00247     _conversionCondDataCol->getParameters().getFloatKeys(conversion_keys);
00248     _dbCondDataCol->getParameters().getFloatKeys(db_keys);
00249     if ( conversion_keys.size() != db_keys.size() ) {
00250       std::cout << "conversion keys:" << std::endl;
00251       for_each ( conversion_keys.begin(), conversion_keys.end(), print );
00252 
00253       std::cout << "db keys:" << std::endl;
00254       for_each ( db_keys.begin(), db_keys.end(), print );
00255       std::cout << std::endl;
00256       std::stringstream message;
00257       message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00258               << "Number of float keys does not match "
00259               << _colNameFromConversion << " != " << _colNameFromDB << " -> " 
00260               << conversion_keys.size() << " !=  " << db_keys.size();
00261       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00262     }
00263 
00264     _conversionCondDataCol->getParameters().getStringKeys(conversion_keys);
00265     _dbCondDataCol->getParameters().getStringKeys(db_keys);
00266 
00267     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBLayer"));
00268     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00269     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBFolder"));
00270     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00271     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBInsertionTime"));
00272     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00273     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBName"));
00274     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00275     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBQueryTime"));
00276     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00277     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBSince"));
00278     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00279     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBTag"));
00280     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00281     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DBTill"));;
00282     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00283     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("DataDescription"));
00284     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00285     a_iter=find(db_keys.begin(),db_keys.end(),std::string("TypeName"));
00286     if (a_iter!=db_keys.end()) db_keys.erase(a_iter);
00287 
00288     if ( conversion_keys.size() != db_keys.size() ) {
00289       std::cout << "conversion keys:" << std::endl;
00290       for_each ( conversion_keys.begin(), conversion_keys.end(), print );
00291 
00292       std::cout << "db keys:" << std::endl;
00293       for_each ( db_keys.begin(), db_keys.end(), print );
00294       std::cout << std::endl;
00295       std::stringstream message;
00296       message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> "
00297               << "Number of string keys does not match "
00298               << _colNameFromConversion << " != " << _colNameFromDB << " -> " 
00299               << conversion_keys.size() << " !=  " << db_keys.size();
00300       throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00301     }
00302 
00303   }
00304 }
00305 
00306 void TestCondDataProcessor::processEvent( LCEvent * evtP ) 
00307 {
00308   _lastEventNumber=static_cast<unsigned int>( evtP->getEventNumber() );
00309   verifyCondDataValidity( evtP );
00310 }
00311 
00312 void TestCondDataProcessor::verifyCondDataValidity( LCEvent *evtP )
00313 {
00314   if (!_conversionCondDataCol || !_dbCondDataCol) {
00315     eventInfo(evtP);
00316     std::stringstream message;
00317     message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> ";
00318     if (_conversionCondDataCol) {
00319       message << "No collection from the converter.";
00320     }
00321     if (_dbCondDataCol) {
00322       message << "No collection from the database.";
00323     }
00324     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00325   }
00326 
00327   if ( _dbSerialID != _conversionSerialID) {
00328     eventInfo(evtP);
00329     std::stringstream message;
00330     message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> conditions change counter do not match : "
00331             << _dbSerialID << " != " << _conversionSerialID;
00332 
00333     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00334   }
00335 
00336   if ( _dbSerialID != _nComparisons ) {
00337     eventInfo(evtP);
00338     std::stringstream message;
00339     message << "TestCondDataProcessor::compareCondData> Not every conditions data change could be compared : "
00340             << _dbSerialID << " != " << _nComparisons;
00341 
00342     throw std::runtime_error(message.str());
00343   }
00344 
00345 }
00346 
00347 void TestCondDataProcessor::eventInfo( LCEvent *evt)
00348 {
00349   UTIL::LCTime event_time( evt->getTimeStamp() );
00350   UTIL::LCTime conversion_since( _conversionCondDataHandler->validSince() );
00351   UTIL::LCTime conversion_till( _conversionCondDataHandler->validTill() );
00352   UTIL::LCTime db_since( _dbCondDataHandler->validSince() );
00353   UTIL::LCTime db_till( _dbCondDataHandler->validTill() );
00354 
00355   UTIL::LCTime db_lastSince( _dbSince );
00356   UTIL::LCTime db_lastTill( _dbTill );
00357   UTIL::LCTime db_priorSince( _dbOldSince );
00358   UTIL::LCTime db_priorTill( _dbOldTill );
00359   UTIL::LCTime db_agedSince( _dbOlderSince );
00360   UTIL::LCTime db_agedTill( _dbOlderTill );
00361 
00362   UTIL::LCTime conversion_lastSince( _conversionSince );
00363   UTIL::LCTime conversion_lastTill( _conversionTill );
00364   UTIL::LCTime conversion_priorSince( _conversionOldSince );
00365   UTIL::LCTime conversion_priorTill( _conversionOldTill );
00366   UTIL::LCTime conversion_agedSince( _conversionOlderSince );
00367   UTIL::LCTime conversion_agedTill( _conversionOlderTill );
00368 
00369   std::cout << "TestCondDataProcessor::eventInfo> run=" << evt->getRunNumber() << " event=" << evt->getEventNumber() 
00370             << " " << event_time.getDateString() << std::endl
00371             << std::setw(20) << "Conversion:" << " serial nr=" << std::setw(6) << _conversionSerialID 
00372             << "(" << _realConversionSerialID - _conversionSerialID << " changes skipped)" << std::endl
00373             << std::setw(20) << "corrent:    " << conversion_since.getDateString()      << " - " << conversion_till.getDateString()  << std::endl
00374             << std::setw(20) << "last change:" << conversion_lastSince.getDateString()  << " - " << conversion_lastTill.getDateString() 
00375             << " id=" << _conversionThisId<< std::endl
00376             << std::setw(20) << "prior last :" << conversion_priorSince.getDateString() << " - " << conversion_priorTill.getDateString()
00377             << " id=" << _conversionOldId<< std::endl
00378             << std::setw(20) << "prior prior:" << conversion_agedSince.getDateString() << " - " << conversion_agedTill.getDateString()
00379             << " id=" << _conversionOlderId<< std::endl
00380             << std::setw(20) <<  " DB: " << "serial nr=" << std::setw(6) << _dbSerialID << std::endl
00381             << std::setw(20) << "corrent:    " << db_since.getDateString()      << " - " << db_till.getDateString() << std::endl
00382             << std::setw(20) << "last change:" << db_lastSince.getDateString()  << " - " << db_lastTill.getDateString()
00383             << " id=" << _dbThisId<< std::endl
00384             << std::setw(20) << "prior last :" << db_priorSince.getDateString() << " - " << db_priorTill.getDateString()
00385             << " id=" << _dbOldId<< std::endl
00386             << std::setw(20) << "prior prior:" << db_agedSince.getDateString() << " - " << db_agedTill.getDateString()
00387             << " id=" << _dbOlderId<< std::endl
00388             << std::endl;
00389 }

00391 
00392 void TestCondDataProcessor::end()
00393 {
00394   std::cout << "--- " << name() << " Report :" << std::endl
00395             << std::setw(8) << _nComparisons              << " comparisons of the conditions data." << std::endl
00396             << std::setw(8) << _dbSerialID                << " conditions data changes from DB (" << _colNameFromDB << ")." << std::endl
00397             << std::setw(8) << _conversionSerialID        << " conditions data changes from Conversion (" << _colNameFromConversion << ")." << std::endl
00398             << std::setw(8) << _realConversionSerialID -_conversionSerialID << " conditions data changes from Conversion skipped " <<  std::endl
00399             << std::setw(8) << " DB         cond data collection stat: " << _dbCondDataColStat << std::endl
00400             << std::setw(8) << " Conversion cond data collection stat: " << _conversionCondDataColStat << std::endl
00401             << std::setw(8) << " DB         cond data parameter  stat: " << _dbCondDataParStat << std::endl
00402             << std::setw(8) << " Conversion cond data parameter  stat: " << _conversionCondDataParStat << std::endl
00403             << std::endl;
00404 
00405 }
